title: Identity Design Inpiration
content:
Looking for some good old fashion inspiration.   
   
Letterhead, Business cards, envelopes -- that typpe of thing.   
   
Any good links?   
   
hildebrant.
author: Hildebrant

comments.content:
Kyle, check out the printed brochures of l'Occitane.   
   
hhp

I actually did design for them ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017074422im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) not the brochures, but I designed there store fronts.   
   
hildebrant.

Wow! That explains their use of true smallcaps, a rarity.   
   
hhp
